Trustworthy AI

This document discusses trustworthy AI, its importance, and the challenges it faces. It provides an overview of the concept of trustworthy AI, its applications, and the need for ethical considerations in AI development. The book is edited by Damian Okaibedi Eke and published by African Perspectives. It explores the role of AI in society, including its potential benefits and risks. The publication is open access and licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Key Concepts:

  • AI development
  • Ethical considerations
  • Open access publishing
  • AI for a Better Future
  • Ethics of AI
  • Innovation Ecosystems
  • Responsibility in Intelligent Systems
